translation.synclip introduction: Welcome to use synclip, synclip is a network-synchronized clipboard application, allows you to sync-up between devices. It's a private & account-free clipboard, you don't need any account to use it.
translation.failed to create clipboard: Failed to create clipboard, please contact website admin.
translation.failed to fetch items: Failed to fetch contents from clipboard.
translation.failed to delete item: Failed to delete this item from clipboard
translation.copied to clipboard: Already copied this item to clipboard:
translation.delete item: Are you sure to delete item:
translation.confirmation is requires before deleting: Confirmation is requires before deleting item
translation.do you want to delete the whole clipboar: Do you want to delete the whole clipboard?
translation.Use App to scan this QR code: Use App to scan this QR code
translation.Firefox notify: You're using firefox! You need to set dom.events.asyncClipboard.clipboardItem preference to true if you want to copy image to clipboard. To change preferences in Firefox, visit about:config.
